wordpressPost.title: Using Data to Fuel Your Employee Engagement Program [SlideShare]
wordpressPost.content:
Arming yourself with the latest and greatest data is often the first (and necessary) step to gaining buy-in for taking your employee engagement program to the next level.

57% of employees, and 76% of Millennials, want their employer to do more around employee engagement

This is one of the powerful findings from our new research report, The Evolution of Employee Engagement. But as a business stakeholder, how do you take data and turn it into actionable and impactful results for your employee engagement program?

Learn the New Rules of Employee Engagement:

Drawing on the latest data from our new report, our SlideShare answers six critical employee engagement questions. From building the business case and identifying key engagement drivers, to learning how to impact employee engagement, click through to learn how to strengthen your employee engagement program to drive greater impact.

The Evolution of Employee Engagement 2015 from WeSpire

Don’t miss out on the latest findings. Download WeSpire’s original research compiling 6 years of survey data on employee engagement trends in the workplace.
